meanings.definition: The quality or state of being upright in position or posture.
meanings.sent1: Her uprightness in standing tall impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His uprightness in posture showed confidence and strength.
meanings.sent3: The tree's uprightness made it look like a soldier at attention.
meanings.sent4: The uprightness of the skyscraper was a symbol of architectural mastery.
meanings.sent5: The uprightness of the flagpole against the clear sky was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being honest and morally upright.
meanings.sent1: Her uprightness in always telling the truth earned her respect.
meanings.sent2: His uprightness in dealing with others made him a trusted leader.
meanings.sent3: The detective's uprightness in solving the case surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The uprightness of the judge was unquestionable in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The uprightness of the charity organization was evident in their transparent operations.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being straight or vertical.
meanings.sent1: The uprightness of the ruler helped in drawing straight lines.
meanings.sent2: The tree's uprightness made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The uprightness of the building's walls was crucial for its stability.
meanings.sent4: The uprightness of the pole supported the weight of the flag.
meanings.sent5: The uprightness of the mountain peak against the horizon was breathtaking.
